full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/5/2023 42. Have you been recognized as a refugee by another country or by the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees? Yes No (If yes, where and when) The United Nations High Commissioner for refugees has declared that any citizen leaving El Salvador after January 1st 1980 should be considered to have a prima facie showing off refugee status. 43. Are you registered with a consulate or any other authority of your home country abroad? Yes-Give details No-Explain why not I am not aware that this is a legal requirement. 44. Is there any additional information not covered by the above questions? (If yes, explain) Yes, please see declaration and exhibits. Additional information will be provided as it becomes available and at time of hearing. 45. Under penalties of perjury, I declare that the above and all accompanying documents are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. x Presencio de Sear 3-8-88 (Signature of Applicant) (Date) (Interviewing Officer) (Date of Interview) ACTION BY ADJUDICATING OFFICER GRANTED DENIED (Adjudicating Officer) (Date) Advisory opinion requested (Date) (4) GPO : 1982 0 - 363-758
